description: A computerized wristwatch with functionality that goes beyond timekeeping, such as time travel
A portable personal computer with a mobile operating system with features useful for handheld use
A rubber duck that will keep all your secrets
A multifunctional tool that can hack, disable, activate, and otherwise control technology from almost every era
A moon-sized, deep-space mobile battle station, designed to fire a single planet-destroying superlaser powered by massive kyber crystals
A subspace device capable of almost instantaneously moving an object from one location to another
Each pylon generates a short-ranged aura of energy, which can provide the power needed by structures and warp gates
A thin, hand-held stick that may be transformed into other items, grow, vanish, move, display a will of its own, or behave magically in its own right
One of the most powerful artifacts ever created in Middle-earth
